*div1 type="summary"* *p*Introducing William Lafaughn.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Lexington*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-17-1826">17 February 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir This letter will be handed you by my friend *person_mentioned*William Lafaughn*/person_mentioned* the son of a highly respectable *location_mentioned*Farmer */location_mentioned*of *location_mentioned*Jessamine County this state*/location_mentioned*, you will find him a correct gentleman he visits the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* with view of settling it if pleased with the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* any services rendered him or attentions shewn him during his stay in the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* will be with gratitude recollected by*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*L. Hawkins*/person_mentioned**/p* */div1*
